messages.subject: Back soon!
messages.msgSnippet: I m going to be off for a week visiting family. Now Mary, Nancy, I don t expect there to be any fights between you two while mom s away, hear? ;-) Joyce
messages.messageBody:
I'm going to be off for a week visiting family.

Now Mary, Nancy, I don't expect there to be any fights between you two while
mom's away, hear? ;-)

Joyce

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] test/no mail
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think everyone s off having fun in the sun finally :-) Joyce
messages.messageBody:
on 7/11/03 7:03 PM, Mary at mummy124@... wrote:

> LOL!!! I've been through all my list home sights thinking something was
> wrong on my end!! I haven't gotten but a few in the past two days from any
> of my lists.

I think everyone's off having fun in the sun finally :-)

Joyce
